ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: Thanks to the China Environmental Monitoring Station for the PM 2.5 data released in the national city air quality real-time release system ( http://106.37.208.233:20035), and the Tencent-based location service ( http://heat.qq.com/) and spatiotemporal big data and POI data provided by the National Bureau of Statistics ( http://data.stats.gov.cn/).
